author: Ingrid Lunden
title: Black Friday sees record $7.4B in online sales, $2.9B spent using smartphones
description: Following swiftly on the heels of a Thanksgiving that broke records with $4.2 billion in online sales, Black Friday also hit a new high, although it just fell short of predictions. According to analytics from Adobe, consumers spent $7.4 billion online yesterd…

author: Connie Loizos
title: Storm Ventures just closed its sixth fund with $130 million
description: Storm Ventures, a now 19-year-old, Sand Hill Road venture firm in Menlo Park, Ca., has closed on $130.4 million, shows a new SEC filing. The outfit began its fundraising late last, according to an earlier filing. It had closed its previous fund with $180 mill…
